description: “‘Two and 20’ is going to make a lot of people rich. And it’s going to make very few investors rich,” said Warren Buffett on hedge fund fees. “It borders on obscene.”
title: Buffett Skewers. Big Money Scoffs.
title_page: Buffett Skewers. Big Money Scoffs. - Video - NYTimes.com
text: “‘Two and 20’ is going to make a lot of people rich. And it’s going to make very few investors rich,” said Warren Buffett on hedge fund fees. “It borders on obscene.”
